page.title: 11Houses Cookley Green Area.
page.content: There are ten Council houses in Russells Water. No council houses in Maidensgrove or Cookley Green. There is little or no other rented accomod- ation. A private house with four bed- rooms in approx. a quarter of an acre costs in the region of 175000 pounds. A plot of building land for one house with good garden would cost 50000 - 60000 pounds. Land suitable for pony paddock would cost 2000 - 4000 pounds. A parcel of Freehold Agricultural land of approx. 8.9 acres, in Russells Water, sold for 20000 pounds in the summer of 1985.
